title: Free Child Care Business Resources - Texas Workforce Commission
text: Welcome to our collection of free resources for child care business leaders! Boost your business with these no-cost tools designed to support your success. Whether you’re seeking operational support, financial management tools, or other valuable insights, our curated list of resources is here to help you make your child care business the best it can be. Learn more about the basics that keep your business running smoothly. Technology and Automation Resources for Child Care Businesses Learn how to use technology to be more efficient. English: Spanish: Record-Keeping System Learn how and why to accurately track records for your business. English: Spanish: Child Care Management System Description: Selecting the best automation for your business. English: Spanish: Employee Handbook Description: Learn how to create an employee manual to support your child care business. English: Spanish: Contracts Description: How to develop effective agreements that safeguard your business. English: Spanish: Should I Incorporate my Child Care Business? Learn how to decide what business structure is right for your business. English: Spanish: Liability Insurance Understanding the need for liability insurance and how to find the best policy for you. English: Spanish: Managing Enrollment Description: Learn the basics of successful enrollment practices English: Spanish: How Can I Create an Effective Sales and Marketing Plan? Description: Learn how to develop a successful marketing plan to promote your child care business. English: Spanish: Retirement Options Description: Learn how you, your business, and your employees can benefit from a business retirement plan. English: Spanish: Salary Exempt vs Non-Exempt Description: Know the difference between salary exempt and non-exempt status employees. English: Spanish: How to Enroll in the Child & Adult care Food Program (CACFP) Learn how child care providers and the families they serve can all benefit from the CACFP. English: Spanish: How do I manage my time effectively? Learn how to develop time management skills and systems to support your child care business. English: Spanish: Small Business Resources Learn about free and low-cost resources for your business English: Spanish: Using Artificial Intelligence in Your Child Care Business Learn how to use the power of AI to make your team more efficient English: Spanish: Learn more and access templates to help you track expenses, manage revenue, set your pricing and more. Accountable Plans Learn why an accountable plan is important and how to create one for your business English: Spanish: Simple Monthly Budget Learn the steps to take and access an easy-to-use template to track your spending. English: Spanish: How do I set my rates for my child care business? Learn how to set pricing that is “just right” for your business. English: Spanish: Step-by-step guides on the many ways that you can attract talent and reward your staff. When is Someone a Contractor or an Employee? Learn how to classify your staff English: Spanish: Reducing Employee Turnover Learn cost-effective, simple strategies for retaining employees at your business. English: Spanish: Learn more about taxes, tax preparation strategies to improve your filing, and other important topics that impact your taxes. Depreciation Review the basics of depreciation and how it works so you can understand when you need to prepare for higher taxes and when you don’t. English: Spanish: Maximizing Your Tax Deductions: Employing Your Child Learn how you can maximize your tax deductions during tax time by employing your child. English: Spanish: Description: A step-by-step guide to understanding, issuing, and receiving Forms 1099 English: Spanish: Pay Increases and Payroll Taxes Description: Learn how to navigate the increase in cost associated with raising employee compensation. English: Spanish: Tax Considerations for Selling Your Home Learn how taxes will apply, and for how much, if you plan to sell your home. English: Spanish: Time/Space Calculation Learn how to account for common expenses incurred by in-home child care services. English: Spanish: Worksheet: Learn about other topics that can enhance your child care business, whether you’re an established business owner or just starting out. Child Care-Employer Partnership Guide Learn how to partner with employers to support your business and serve working families. English: Spanish: Guide for New Child Care Businesses Get essential tips and helpful advice for aspiring entrepreneurs entering the child care industry. English: Spanish: What is the Child Care Services (CCS) Program and How Can I Become a Contracted Provider? Learn how your business can benefit from becoming a CCS provider. English: Spanish:
